S.FORM: tungawen 1. maliyuk nu tungawen ku umah ni Bunuk i Maibul. (Bunuk ). 2. u Lalimenah ku miladayay patayzaay i teban nu tungawen tu tademaw. ( Lalimenah ). Lalimenah . 3. liliden nu Salasalaw ku masabaay niza a tademaw patayza i tepad atu i teban nu tungawen. (Salasalaw , ). Salasalaw , . 4. Lalimenah Salasalaw di'tu 5. di'tu nu Maibul izau ku Salasalaw, Alikakay, Tadatadah, Lalimenah. ( Salasalaw,Alikakay, Tadatadah, Lalimenah).
